thread.title: Jamie Goldberg on the Timbers' 4-1 win against Colorado and playoffs
thread.title_full: Jamie Goldberg on the Timbers' 4-1 win against Colorado and playoffs | OregonLive.com

author: Molly Blue | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Jamie Goldberg on the Timbers' 4-1 win against Colorado and playoffs
text:
Portland Timbers beat writer Jamie Goldberg traces the Portland Timbers' surge into the Major League Soccer playoffs after they clinched the No. 3 spot in the standings with a 4-1 win against Colorado on Sunday.
Goldberg tracks the Timbers through their last four games, which saw them go from hovering just below the red line to where they are hosting a playoff game, boosted by a 10-goal outburst that turned into a three-game win streak.
She sets up the playoffs, talking about the Timbers' opponent, Sporting Kansas City, which defeated Portland 1-0 in their last visit to Providence Park on Oct. 3.
â€” Molly Blue
